summary: This release brings Grove's elegant image galleries to life with the new Petal content moderation system, keeping shared spaces safe and beautiful. We've enhanced your control with per-tenant encrypted tokens for the Git Dashboard and introduced UI Grafts for flexible, tenant-specific features. Under the hood, we've smoothed out performance and resolved several key issues, all while continuing to cultivate a more secure and polished platform for your community.

features: Add Petal image content moderation system (#412)
add Lumen AI Gateway spec and documentation
add Git Dashboard APIs with per-tenant token encryption
add Gallery Curio for multi-tenant image galleries
add autumnsgrove posts content update script
add museum-documentation skill for elegant Wanderer documentation
migrate CDN from cdn.autumnsgrove.com to cdn.grove.place
move Petal to First Frost phase (#411)
add vine leaf pattern to site layout
fixes: Add AI binding type and fix Petal type errors
Skip prerendering in CI to avoid AI binding auth requirement
Skip custom validation for SvelteKit form actions entirely
Exempt SvelteKit form actions from custom CSRF validation
comprehensive admin panel fixes from live testing
register Lumen spec in knowledge base
Fix config save not showing feedback
correct GlassCard import in reserved-usernames page
